name: Mimi
greetingText: Hope this cheers up your day even a lil bit!!
wishText: I look forward to more years with you ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: Thought to do just that but then I stopped
text3: Cause even though we're far apart.
text4: I wanted to do something extra
outroText: I hope u like the present I sent over :]
replayText: Klik kt sini kalau nk repeat (tpi jangan bnyak sngat takut rindu terlebih hshshshs)
